publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3392 David Mundell: International Forest Fest 2002-That the Parliament notes that the International Forest Fest 2002 will be held at Lockerbie on 25 to 28 September 2002; further notes that the event will not only be the flagship of Treefest Scotland 2002 but will also bring together for the first time in the UK two major biennial events, the 25th World Logging Championships and the APF International Forest Machinery Exhibition, along with many other prestigious competitions and varied forest events; congratulates all those involved in organising this unique forest spectacular and bringing it to Scotland, and sends its best wishes for a successful event, not only to the organisers, but also to the many thousands of competitors, exhibitors and visitors attending the event.
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Mary Scanlon*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Murray Tosh*
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Murdo Fraser*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, John Scott*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Alex Neil*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Michael Russell*, Robin Harper*

S1M-3392 David Mundell: International Forest Fest 2002-That the Parliament notes that the International Forest Fest 2002 will be held at Lockerbie on 25 to 28 September 2002; further notes that the event will not only be the flagship of Treefest Scotland 2002 but will also bring together for the first time in the UK two major biennial events, the 25th World Logging Championships and the APF International Forest Machinery Exhibition, along with many other prestigious competitions and varied forest events; congratulates all those involved in organising this unique forest spectacular and bringing it to Scotland, and sends its best wishes for a successful event, not only to the organisers, but also to the many thousands of competitors, exhibitors and visitors attending the event. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Phil Gallie, Mr Murray Tosh, Murdo Fraser, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, John Scott, Alex Fergusson, Mr Jamie Stone, Alex Neil, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Michael Russell, Robin Harper
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3392 International Forest Fest 2002 (lodged on 16 September 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
